reviewText: Akira Itazura is a truly lovely young lady with a sweet, innocent face, nicely toned body and magnificent natural breasts that can be appreciated in a series of short vignettes throught this dvd.  The camerawork is well done, with slow languorous shots of Akira and lighting that accentuates her attractiveness.  This production also ignores the usual Japanese taboo against revealing the pubic area, and though not explicit, has frequent full frontal nudity.  The only drawback some will find are the short interviews with Akira that intersperse her nude scenes; these are all in Japanese without subtitles.  Still, all in all this is one of the best and most artistic productions in this genre, and well worth the time of anyone who appreciates the female form.

This is: "Akira is a shy girl who prefers to spend time alone at her summer house. You can join her as she talks about her private life and her innermost, deepest thoughts."
